explains: n. 饥荒，饥馑；匮乏，短缺；<古>饥饿

sentences.en: Famine hit that benighted country once more.
sentences.cn: 饥荒再次袭击了那个落后的国家。

sentences.en: The famine threatened to depopulate the continent.
sentences.cn: 饥荒威胁着该大陆人口数量。

sentences.en: If the drought continues there's going to be a famine.
sentences.cn: 如果旱灾继续下去很可能要发生饥荒。
